verses.text: \w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w left|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sin|strong="H5512"\w*, moving \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w place|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w place|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6310"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w Rephidim|strong="H7508"\w*, \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w contended|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.” “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*?” \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* replied. “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w test|strong="H5254"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?”

\w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w thirsted|strong="H6770"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w grumbled|strong="H3885"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*—\w to|strong="H4191"\w* make \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w stone|strong="H5619"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*!”

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w ahead|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w some|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w along|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*. \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Massah|strong="H4532"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meribah|strong="H4809"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* quarreled, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w tested|strong="H5254"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, saying, “\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H1121"\w*?”

After \w this|strong="H3478"\w*, \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w attacked|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Rephidim|strong="H7508"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, “Choose \w some|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*. \w Tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hilltop \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* instructed \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*, while \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Aaron, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* long \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w held|strong="H4872"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H1396"\w*; \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* lowered \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H1396"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*’ \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* grew \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stone \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w* \w held|strong="H8551"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w*, \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w each|strong="H3947"\w* \w side|strong="H2088"\w*, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* steady \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w went|strong="H4872"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6310"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w overwhelmed|strong="H2522"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H6310"\w* \w army|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Write|strong="H3789"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scroll|strong="H5612"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w reminder|strong="H2146"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w recite|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w utterly|strong="H4229"\w* \w blot|strong="H4229"\w* \w out|strong="H4229"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w memory|strong="H2143"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w The|strong="H1129"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w Is|strong="H8034"\w* \w My|strong="H7121"\w* Banner.

“\w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* throne \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.”
